import React, {useEffect, useState, useRef, useMemo, Ref} from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; import {Table, Container, Modal, Button, Form, FormGroup, CloseButton, Dropdown} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { ActorDto, MovieDetailsDto, MovieDto } from '../model'; import { AiFillEye, AiFillEdit, AiFillDelete } from 'react-icons/ai'; import InfiniteScroll from './InfiniteScroll'; import { BASE_API } from '../constants'; import DropdownMenu from 'react-bootstrap/esm/DropdownMenu'; const MoviesComponent: React.FC = () => { const [movies, setMovies] = useState([]) const [page, setPage] = useState(0) const [size, setSize] = useState(10) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [last, setLast] = useState(false) const [showDetails, setShowDetails] = useState(false); const [showEdit, setShowEdit] = useState(false) const [movie, setMovie] = useState() const hasMoreData = !last; const mockActors : ActorDto[] = [{"id": 1, "fullName":"John Johnson"},{"id": 2, "fullName":"James Jameson"}, {"id": 3, "fullName":"Anna Smith"}, {"id": 4, "fullName":"Peter Parker"}, {"id": 5, "fullName":"John Ceena"}, {"id": 6, "fullName":"Luke Skywalker"}, {"id": 7, "fullName":"Harry Potter"}, {"id": 8, "fullName":"Tony Stark"}, {"id": 9, "fullName":"Bruce Wayne"}, {"id": 10, "fullName":"Bruce Banner"}, {"id": 11, "fullName":"Albus Dumbledore"}, {"id": 12, "fullName":"Sirius Black"}, {"id": 13, "fullName":"Hermione Granger"}] const loadMoreNumbers = () => { setLoading(true); axios.get(BASE_API, {params: {"pageSize" : size, "pageNumber": page}}).then(res =>{ setPage(page+1) setMovies([...movies, ...res.data.content]); setLoading(false); }) }; const handleCloseDetails = () => setShowDetails(false); const handleShowDetails = () => setShowDetails(true); const handleCloseEdit = () => setShowEdit(false); const handleShowEdit= () => setShowEdit(true); const getMovieDetails = (id:string) =>{ axios.get(BASE_API+"/"+id).then(res => { setMovie(res.data); }) } const updateRating = () =>{ } return ( <> {movies.map((movie, index) =>( ) )}
RANK TITLE YEAR RATING REVENUE
{index+1} {movie.title} {new Date(movie.date).getFullYear()} {movie.rating} ${movie.revenue.toLocaleString('en-US', {maximumFractionDigits:2})} {handleShowDetails(); getMovieDetails(movie.id)}}/> {handleShowEdit(); getMovieDetails(movie.id)}}/>
{movie?.title}
Release date
{movie?.date}
Genre
{movie?.genres.map(({ name }) => name).join(', ')}
Description
{movie?.description}
Director
{movie?.director.fullName}
Actors
{movie?.actors.map(({ fullName }) => fullName).join(', ')}
Runtime
{movie?.runtime + " mins"}
Rating
{movie?.rating}
Votes
{movie?.votes}
Revenue
${movie?.revenue.toLocaleString('en-US', {maximumFractionDigits:2})}

Release date setMovie({...movie!, date: e.target.value})}/>

Runtime setMovie({...movie!, runtime: +e.target.value})}/> Rating setMovie({...movie!, rating: +e.target.value})} min = "1" max="10" required/> Votes setMovie({...movie!, votes: +e.target.value})}/> Revenue setMovie({...movie!, revenue: +e.target.value})}/>
) } export default MoviesComponent
